name: Unstable Adventure
description:
Jake Hunter accidentally entered a strange cave, where he met a scary man. A man named himself The Guardian of Eternity. He asked Jake to go away or he would kill him. Hunter did not obey The Guardian and kill him. After his death, Jake appears on a planet named Kyrouak. Jake should find some magical artifact, which can help to open the portal. The hero will be accompanied by weapons-companions: a talking sword Wisecrack and a rifle Cherry this whole journey. They have difficult characters and are addicted to uncontrollable aggression. Only that way leads to Jake`s home. But it will take more time than he thought...

Controls:

- A,  to go left;

- D, to go right;

- E, to change weapon;

- SPACE, to jump;

- Left Mouse Button, to destroy tile and attack enemies .

Our team:

- Andrey Tymul: team lead, programmer;

- Sergey Handrykin: programmer;

- Pavel Zhulkovsky: technical game-designer;

- Melnikova Violetta: narrative game-designer;

- Natalia Kiseluova: artist;

- Olga Makhnach: artist;
